short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be notified when a new chapter of One Piece arrives!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of compulsively checking when a new chapter comes out? 
This extension allows you to be notified when a new manga chapter of One Piece is out üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è
Its very simple: clicking in the icon of the extension you will see this information:
- A message that shows that the chapter did not come out
Or
- A message that shows the new chapter number and title. Also, you'll receive a notification in your browser in that moment.

Made with love for One Piece addicts. ‚ò†Ô∏èüëë
